item.title: Vacancy for Coaching Facilitator
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Date: June 29, 2018 Applications are invited for two posts of ‘Facilitators’ for ‘Technology-based after-school Coaching Program’ at Mussoorie (CST and Tibetan homes school) and STS Mundgod. Coaching Facilitator will ‘run and monitor’ the Class XI & XII After-School Coaching Program. (Facilitator will not teach in the classes; they will facilitate the technology-based classroom for...

item.title: Teaching Post Vacancy at CTE, Bhuntar
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, Central Tibetan Administration, Dharamsala invites application for the post of Assistant Professors at Centre for Teacher Education, camped at CUTS, Varanasi on contract basic for the academic session July 2018- May 2019

item.title: Vacancies at STSS Poanta
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Sambhota Tibetan Schools Society, Dharamshala invites application for the post of one Librarian, one Health Worker and one Matron at Poanta. Kindly go through below announcement for more details. Click to Download the Announcement
